模块 org.overrun.swgl.core
程序包 org.overrun.swgl.core.io

接口 IFileProvider

函数接口:
这是一个函数接口, 因此可用作 lambda 表达式或方法引用的赋值目标。
@FunctionalInterface public interface IFileProvider
The file provider interface for operating files.
从以下版本开始:
0.1.0
作者:
squid233

  • 字段概要

    说明

    CLASSPATH
    The classpath file provider.
    static final IFileProvider
    LOCAL
    The local file provider.

      Get the file from the filename.

      返回:
      The InputStream

      Create a file provider from class loader.

      The file provider

    • of

      Create a file provider from class.
      参数:
      cls - The class.
      返回:
      The file provider

    • ofCaller

      static IFileProvider ofCaller()
      Create a file provider from caller class.

      This is a convenience method, using StackWalker.

      返回:
      The file provider
